title: BlueGuard
description: BlueGuard is an access control system based on Bluetooth low energy. The finalist of the Best Marketing at the Capstone Design Exhibition in ITB EE Days as the final assignment of college.

title: Archi
description: Archi is a building design system with AI-based data integration. This project was developed using 24 Steps of Disciplined Entrepreneurship framework.

title: Cleaning Robots
description: The cleaning robot incorporates a designed algorithm to ensure complete coverage of the cleaning path and detect objects to maneuver around or walls as turning points.

title: Calculate Distance with Camera
description: The distance measurement process operates at 24 frames per second with a resolution of 640 x 480 pixels. The average error in distance measurement using the camera is 8.09 cm.
